portfolio.description: Senior Frontend Developer with 7+ years of experience building scalable web and mobile applications using React, React Native, and TypeScript. Strong background in frontend architecture, performance optimization, and API integrations, with experience in enterprise, fintech, and international MVP projects.

journey.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
journey.description: Delivering frontend solutions using React, TypeScript, and Clean Architecture. Focused on maintainable code.

journey.title: Full-Stack Developer
journey.description: Built full-stack features with a heavy focus on React.js, leveraging solid backend and database knowledge.

journey.title: Systems Developer
journey.description: Developed enterprise applications using .NET MVC, JavaScript, and SQL Server. Implemented data solutions with Power BI.

use_cases.buu_desc: Full-stack scheduling platform built from scratch (Web and Mobile) focused on online appointments with WhatsApp integration. Developed using React, React Native, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Responsible for the entire product lifecycle, including frontend, backend, infrastructure setup, and CI/CD automation with GitHub Actions, ensuring high availability and reliability.
use_cases.no_description: Frontend project built with React and TypeScript, using Styled Components and automated tests with Jest and React Testing Library, focused on clean code and reusable components.

career.title: Enterprise Project Experience

career.ppc_desc: Shipyard operations management system with real-time monitoring, built with React and .Net Core
career.superesp_dec: O SuperEsp is a solution developed by Espiral Engenharia for the management of operational activities, assembly and disassembly of scaffolding and safety in the field.
career.other_dec: A selection of professional projects developed during my career and shared on LinkedIn. These works demonstrate my experience with React, React Native, and TypeScript, building scalable, high-quality web and mobile applications used in real production environments.
